name: Fuel and Rescue
description:
A Trijam #144 entry

Rescue stranded hikers using the only part of the helicopter you can: the fuel bar!

Including art from Kenney:

  • Background Elements Redux
  • Fonts
  • Foliage Pack
  • Platformer Characters
  • Tanks
  • UI Pack

Rescue helicopter courtesy of OpenGameArt's Bart

Music / SFX:

https://incompetech.filmmusic.io/song/7017-voxel-revolution
